channel.title: How To Make A Safezone?
channel.description: Ok,well i switched my home on my server,and now the new home is not a safezone...i'm trying to make it safezone so ppl don't just sit there and kill each other...THE PROBLEM IS I DON'T KNOW HOW...i've read almost ever tut on here..I DON'T UNDERSTAND THEM...everytime i try it either fails,or i get errors...i was wondering if i gave somone the cords for what i wanted...they could make a safezone with my cords...and send me the code..so all i would have to do is copy and paste..because i'm beyond confusen,and bout to just give up on....it....ANY HELP WOULD BE GREATLY APPERICATED... :confused:

item.title: How To Make A Safezone?
item.dc:creator: @nacnac nacnac
item.description:
@nacnac wrote:

|| (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 )

first x is moth south west second is most north east first y is most south west second y is north east y

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make A Safezone?
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

find in client.java nonwild
add yours to the list like this

                || (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)

x1 and y1 are most southwest point you want to be safe
x2 and y2 are most northeast point you want to be safe
so it looks like a box
_______<— northeast
| |
| |
->---------
southwest

Read full topic
